CustomField.description: Profit Margin on Software - Solidworks Products
CustomField.formula: IF( ( NOT(CONTAINS('Software:Initial:Renewal:Training:Services', Category_Product__c)) || ISBLANK(Category_Product__c) || ISNULL(Category_Product__c)), IF(ListPrice<>0, (Purchase_Price__c / ListPrice), IF(Sales_Price_After_Discount__c<>0, (Purchase_Price__c / Sales_Price_After_Discount__c) , 0) ) , 0)
CustomField.label: Profit Margin
